thread.section_title: Gild Hall, a Thompson Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent Service and lovely design
thread.title_full: Excellent Service and lovely design - Review of Gild Hall, a Thompson Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: christianD1034UU
title: Excellent Service and lovely design
text:
A nearly perfect stay at this hotel in NYC. Great service, cool designed rooms, hall and a delicious breakfast!!! There is nothing to improve!
One thing for athletes: the Gym unfortunately is terribly small and poorly equipped. :(
